org.cpsolver.studentsct.filter

Class RandomStudentFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.studentsct.filter.RandomStudentFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StudentFilter

    public class RandomStudentFilter
extends Object
implements StudentFilter
    This student filter accepts every student with the given probability. The choice for each student is remembered, i.e., if the student is passed to the filter multiple times the same answer is returned.
    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
    Copyright (C) 2007 - 2014 Tomáš Müller
